#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Bestow a Blessing
#Text=How to bless a person , group , place or thing .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Figure out exactly who or what the blessing is going to be for .
#Text=Using names is always best .
#Text=Think about what attributes you want to create or enhance in the object of the blessing .
#Text=Traits such as peace , strength , courage , wit , kindness , grace , good looks , health , happiness , long life , justice , and prosperity are some possibilities .
#Text=If you 're religious , look at your scripture for ideas .
#Text=There might be a verse or quote you want to use , or there may be pre-written blessings you can recite .
#Text=If you 're not religious or do n't want to do a religious-sounding blessing , look up some other kinds of quotes , especially poetry .
#Text=Even songs .
#Text=These can be inspirational even if you choose to write your own blessing .
#Text=Compose the words of the blessing .
#Text=You can write them down or memorize them , but make sure you know what you 're going to say before you say it .
#Text=Just as with a toast or a speech , you do n't want to spoil it by forgetting the words or stumbling .
#Text=Keep it concise : it should n't take more than two minutes to say the whole thing , and preferably less time than that .
#Text=If you want to , you can include a ritual of any sort you like .
#Text=Try reading up on rituals , rites and superstitions to get some ideas .
#Text=Start with traditions from your own ancestry or ethnicity .
#Text=To bless a person , place your hand on his or her head .
#Text=Traditionally the right hand , which in most people is stronger , is the best one to use .
#Text=If touching is unacceptable , hold your hand above the person .
#Text=Recite the blessing .
#Text=Have a drink or a special treat to celebrate , or give the object of the blessing a gift .
#Text=Tips
#Text=Do n't use the blessing as a lecture .
#Text=You can also bless a house , a place of business , the food you eat , or anything you make with your hands .

#Text=Different people have different ideas of what a blessing actually does ; depending on your point of view , it 's a request to the higher Power to bestow the real gifts , or it 's an expression of your will with the hope that what you want will become manifest .
#Text=Use phrases in the future tense , such as " May you ...
